src/jumski/breakage/breaks/*.clj.template:
(ns jumski.breakage.breaks.%s
  (:use [jumski.breakage.sequencer])
  (:require [jumski.breakage.kit :as kit])
  (:require [overtone.live :as o]))

(def amen-break (kit/load-kit "samples/amen-break"))

(def base {:kick1   [_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]
           :snare2  [_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]
           :chat2   [_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]
           :ssnare4 [_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]})

(defn pattern [] (merge-with concat base))

(o/stop)
(play amen-break #'pattern 194)
